Posts.Content: Apr 14, 2008 05:30PM laknob wrote: I'm not new to breastcancer.org, but it's been a while since I've posted.  I was originally diagnosed in Oct. 04 stage 2b.  In July 06, I was diagnosed stage 4 (mets to bones and liver).  The one thing that has helped me to deal with the fear is to live just for today.  I don't worry about tomorrow, I just get through today, usually with smiles and laughter.  Once you make up your mind to live in the moment, you will have very few "fear breakthroughs".  Lucy
Posts.Title: How do people deal with the fear? Lesley1 mthomp2020
